attributes.action: To stop Ken Clarke MP & MPs supporting and insighting anti democratic behaviour.
attributes.additional_details:
I feel that Kenneth Clarke MP and other like minded MP's are using voters high fuelled feelings to create as much disruption as possible and giving these people false hope. 
The vote was for an exit, it was carried out in a proper democratic system that has been used for centuries and just because it is not the result he and others wanted, does not give him and others the right to undermine our democratic system. If continued he could be inciting hatred and more.
attributes.background: Kenneth Clarke MP has advised the following action for expats 1. Everyone should sign the petition calling for a second referendum.2.Expats can mobilise as a group and get something like a petition together to present to Downing Street - and 3. Create  as much publicity as possible.
